New Records: Shohei Ohtani became the first player in the majors with 50 home runs and stolen bases in a single season
Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani hit 6-6 in the game, including his 50th and 51st steals, and 51st home run
Post-Match Reflections: MLB commissioner Rob Manfred congratulated Shohei Ohtani on his remarkable achievement
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Los Angeles Dodgers dominated the Miami Marlins, winning 20-4
Others: Ohtani posted 17 total bases, 10 RBI, and three home runs in the game
